TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Rgyax, title = Rgyax, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rgyax} }

S.FORM: Rgyax Itiniay i Datong Cen no Yilan ko Rgyax a niyaro', 74 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 246 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 235 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 11 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal87%, Amis2%, Seediq1%, roma5%.

Rgyax Itiniay i Datong Cen no Yilan ko Rgyax a niyaro', 74 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 246 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 235 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 11 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal87%, Amis2%, Seediq1%, roma5%.
